NAME: Zia Nariman
ABOUT:
Extensive financial institution expertise having worked in the U.S and Asia for over seven years across the product spectrum of debt, equity, sell side M&A and buy side M&A. Significant privatization and restructuring experience gained from advising Korean and Taiwanese banks in the aftermath of the Asian Crisis. 

MBA from The Wharton School at The University of Pennsylvania. MSC from the London School of Economics. BA from Mount Holyoke College.

Specialties: market and industry analysis, due diligence, financial modeling and valuation, structuring, mergers and acquisition, capital projections and analysis, client management, transaction origination and execution, interviewing, training and mentoring of Junior Associates and Analysts, Asian experience, depository institutions, banks, investment banking, infrastructure, private equity, India, renewable energy, logistics
